price: ߣߌߡߊ ߓߍ߯ ߘߌ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߜߍ߲߬ߜߍ߲߬ߓߊ߯ ߣߌ߫ ߛߙߋ߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߦߴߊ߬ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
